Cute shorts. Not bad for the price offered. Super comfy and love wearing them around the house. Light weight. The fit isn’t great but the quality is good. I would size up if you are looking to get these shorts. I would have loved a size medium but the smalls will do.
The color is super cute and they are super comfy but product material is honestly very cheap. They are super thin and see through and I was just expecting them to be just a bit thicker.

I understand the hype with this boxer trend - super cute and versatile. This pair is comfy and lightweight, cute button detail, color as pictured. My only issue is the sizing. I sized up and ordered a large bc I wanted them to be loose but the waistband is tight, not enough to be uncomfortable but definitely would be if I had ordered TTS. I’m 5’5, 145lbs for reference. Would highly recommend sizing up from your regular size and sizing 2x up for an oversized fit.

I love these. They are light and comfortable and super cute. The material is light and easy to wash and they do rumple a bit in the dryer but there pajamas so I’m ok with that. The sizing was right on and they were a great price.
